text:
Not a huge Starbucks, but there‚Äôs enough tables to go around, although during peak hours like in the afternoon there‚Äôs a lot of diners standing around waiting for seats.

‚è∞ In any case, the drinks were served fast when we did the mobile order - and thanks to the deal that has 50% off our venti drink that we are here.

No complaints in general just like most Starbucks üëçüèª

The newly renovated cafe at Waterway Point is indeed much more cosy than before.  Food served hot and drinks prepared nicely! The free handphone strap promo is on thus it is indeed a good experience. Recommend to drop by for a drink or bite.

Never a smile whenever I go there to get coffee beans. After grinding the coffee beans, other branch staff would take the effort to put sticky tape on the bag to ensure the powder doesn't spill.
The staff at Paragon or Little India are so much more friendly and polite.

The staff fooled around when serving.  They busy chatting and laughing. I gota walk over for my drink collection.. It's closing time. The staff keep sweeping and arranging the floor map while others is preparing drink. Very not hygiene. Dust and dirt flying around..

New look aft revo. But sofa gets dirty very easy, and already very dirty.
Had a nice hot coffee. I love the wrap.
It's come with beef stripes and lot of cheese. Serve hot and crispy.
